TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebServicesInteroperability extends System.Object

summary.span: La classe fornisce metodi per verificare se determinati servizi Web sono conformi a una data specifica WS-I (Web Services Interoperability).

span.span: The class provides methods to verify whether a given Web service or services conforms to a given Web Services Interoperability (WS-I) Organization specification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-I pubblica specifiche di servizi Web non proprietari per promuovere l'interoperabilità dei servizi Web tra piattaforme.The WS-I publishes non-proprietary Web services specifications to promote the interoperability of Web services across platforms.

summary.span: Verifica se determinati servizi Web siano conformi a una data specifica WS-I e fornisce un elenco di tutte le violazioni rilevate.

span.span: Verifies whether a given Web service or services conforms to a given WS-I specification, and provides a list of any violations that it finds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-I pubblica specifiche di servizi Web non proprietari per promuovere l'interoperabilità dei servizi Web tra piattaforme.The WS-I publishes non-proprietary Web services specifications to promote the interoperability of Web services across platforms.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool CheckConformance (System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles claims, System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription description, System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolationCollection violations);

.method public static hidebysig bool CheckConformance(valuetype System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles claims, class System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription description, class System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolationCollection violations) cil managed
Public Shared Function CheckConformance (claims As WsiProfiles, description As ServiceDescription, violations As BasicProfileViolationCollection) As Boolean

public: static bool CheckConformance(System::Web::Services::WsiProfiles claims, System::Web::Services::Description::ServiceDescription ^ description, System::Web::Services::Description::BasicProfileViolationCollection ^ violations);

param.name: claims
param.span: Un membro di che indica una specifica WSI (Web Services Interoperability).

span.span: A member of that indicates a Web services interoperability specification.

param.name: description
param.span: Oggetto che descrive un servizio Web.

span.span: A that describes a Web service.

param.name: violations
param.span: Oggetto che contiene tutte le violazioni rilevate.

span.span: A that contains any violations that were found.

summary.span: Verifica se determinati servizi Web siano conformi a una data specifica WS-I e fornisce un elenco di tutte le violazioni rilevate.

span.span: Verifies whether a given Web service or services conforms to a given WS-I specification, and provides a list of any violations that it finds.

returns.span: se il servizio Web descritto dal parametro è conforme alla specifica WSI indicata dal parametro ; in caso contrario, .

span.span: if the Web service described by conforms to the Web services interoperability specification indicated by ; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-I pubblica specifiche di servizi Web non proprietari per promuovere l'interoperabilità dei servizi Web tra piattaforme.The WS-I publishes non-proprietary Web services specifications to promote the interoperability of Web services across platforms.
